reviews.review:
I was tunneled by a player named (****tunnelplayers) I asked him to explain this hypocrisy. So he said, "He who tunnel tunnelers, runs the risk of becoming a tunneler himself. "If you gaze into the tunnel, the tunnel gaze back".

Did not expect this level of philosophy in a video game.
KIller over powered if they see you, there is no chance of escaping and they just camp your body so you die
Toxic players and idiot describes, servers are not working

People can be toxic but if you don't get worked up over what other people say or do then this is a really enjoyable game. The need to keep leveling up your characters keeps the game interesting and rewarding.

Everyone who plays this game dislikes it, but keeps playing anyways. It's the League of Legends of asymmetrical multiplayers. Really popular and nearly synonymous with the genre, but have you ever met anyone above 500 hours who is happy while playing it? Community is incredibly toxic, survivors think they're entitled to the escape, killers think they're entitled to a 4k. I've made some great friends but at 1700 hours I'm definitely seeing all the game and community's shortcomings.

Agr q nerfaram o ds os killers podem camperar e tunelar a vontade, balanceamento 0%.
Esse jogo so vai te fazer passar raiva, tem um monte de bugs, se vc joga pra passar o tempo que nem eu compra outro jogo.
Divertido, toxico y adictivo... varios a√±os y sigo aqu√≠ jugandolo.

I'll start by saying, I love this game. It's incredibly fun to play as both the survivor and the killer.

I will also say, this game has kind of a complicated community. There's a lot of discourse on what is and isn't toxic behavior or bad sportsmanship in the game, from both killer and survivor perspective. This could be the case with most online multi games, idk (I don't play very many). Sometimes I'll do something I think is totally fine, as killer or survivor, only to get berated in the chat for toxic behavior. Whoops.
Good thing cross-platform is here now and it doesn't have chat, so the chances of getting berated have been lowered.
That's the only real issue I run into with the game, though. Besides the glitches. There's still lots of those.

It's hard to get bored of this game, because there's just so many different ways to play. I recommend!

this game is so good but playing as the killer is cool and playing as a surviver you have to be more team based its so good plus you have so many things to choose from
The game can be fun, But people DC all the time. Ranks mean nothing unless you care.

Purchased it, right after it came out. Has been fun ever since and is one of the few games I still play from time to time after years.

The gameplay is really fun, on both sides and they really listen to the community, when it comes to adding things.

Cant play this s* show any more. EVERY update they break something. When they let the windows store kiddies in there was a bunch of server issues. I mean look at how well PSO2 did there... Now with cross play on top of the windows store users I CANT EVEN RUN IN A STRAIGHT F*ing LINE without rubberbanding back several meters. 70% of my swings are misses cause the survivor is on my screen in front of me in lunge range one moment and gone the next several meters away. Its beyond frustrating and im just done. They have never truly fixed the foundation of the game. The sound breaks every patch. This server crap. They redoing graphics but even people with high end rigs are turning down settings to get more frames. 

They keep adding more and more which is nice... if the other stuff actually worked. For me its unplayable in its current state. And this hasn't been the only time since I started this game that its been like this. So I walk away for good. The frustration has far outweighed and fun factor for quite a while.
good with friends but sad to say its p2w game
Tunnels, op killers, boring maps, game breaking glitches it has the whole thing! its fun like sometimes but thats it. Not worth if new.

Honestly such a great game! awesome idea, fun gameplay when not in a game with toxic players -even that can be fun sometimes- Only issue is the bugs and big hit boxes. Bugs seem to take forever to be fixed and even when they are fixed there is somehow a new bug that is even worse.
Would HIGHLY recommend giving this game a go, especially if you enjoy horror and the feeling of panic rising as you try to finish a generator while a killer stalks towards you.
